Package index

Create indicators

create_op() create_op_demo() create_op_food() create_op_hunger() create_op_adl() create_op_disability() create_op_mental() create_op_dementia() create_op_health() create_op_income() create_op_wash() create_op_anthro() create_op_oedema() create_op_screening() create_op_visual() create_op_misc()
Create older people indicators dataset from survey data collected using the standard RAM-OP questionnaire.

Estimate indicators

estimate_classic()
Apply bootstrap to RAM-OP indicators using a classical estimator.
estimate_op()
Estimate all standard RAM-OP indicators
estimate_probit()
Apply bootstrap to RAM-OP indicators using a PROBIT estimator.

Create charts

chart_op_age() chart_op_muac() chart_op_mf() chart_op_dds() chart_op_k6() chart_op_adl() chart_op_wash() chart_op_csid() chart_op_wg() chart_op_hhs() chart_op_income()
Plot RAM-OP indicators
pyramid_plot()
Function to create a pyramid plot

Create report

report_op_html()
Create an HTML report document containing RAM-OP survey results
report_op_docx()
Create a DOCX report document containing RAM-OP survey results
report_op_odt()
Create a ODT report document containing RAM-OP survey results
report_op_pdf()
Create a PDF report document containing RAM-OP survey results
report_op_table() report_op_demo() report_op_food() report_op_hunger() report_op_disability() report_op_adl() report_op_mental() report_op_dementia() report_op_health() report_op_oedema() report_op_anthro() report_op_screen() report_op_visual() report_op_income() report_op_wash() report_op_misc()
Create table and report chunk of RAM-OP results

Utility/support functions

probit_gam() probit_sam()
PROBIT statistics function for bootstrap estimation of older people GAM
merge_op()
Concatenate classic and PROBIT estimates into a single data.frame

Datasets

testSVY
RAM-OP Survey Dataset
testPSU
RAM-OP Population Dataset
indicators.ALL
RAM-OP Indicators Dataset - ALL
indicators.MALES
RAM-OP Indicators Dataset - MALES
indicators.FEMALES
RAM-OP Indicators Dataset - FEMALES
